DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics OMS643762 ( study drug ) psychiatrically stable schizophrenia patient .
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics OMS643762 Psychiatrically Stable Schizophrenia Subjects
DOC.criteria: Competent provide inform consent . Voluntarily provide informed consent Health Insurance Portability Accounting Act ( HIPAA ) Authorization accordance local regulation govern Institutional Review Board ( IRB ) requirement prior procedure evaluation perform specifically sole purpose study . Have diagnosis schizophrenia define DSMIVTR . Are 18 55 year age inclusive screening visit . Have stable schizophrenia symptomatology great equal three month screen visit , opinion investigator . For enrollment Cohorts 1 2 , take oral antipsychotic medication least seven day parenteral antipsychotic medication least 30 day prior randomization . Subjects stable medication regimen great equal two month screen visit . For enrollment Cohorts 3 , 4 , 5 , stable medication regimen great equal two month screen visit . Have normal clinical laboratory test result ECG , result minor deviation , consider clinically significant investigator . If able reproduce , agree use acceptable method birth control ( e.g. , condom spermicide , oral birth control stable 30 day ) agree remain abstinent Visit 2 90 day last dose study drug male 30 day last dose study drug female . Have history lactose intolerance allergy dairy product . Are pregnant lactating . Have history presence significant cardiovascular , respiratory , hepatic , renal , gastrointestinal , endocrine , neurological disorder , opinion investigator , increase risk study drug may confound interpretation study measure . Have history alcohol dependence ( within 12 month screen ) abuse ( within six month screen ) define DSMIVTR consume excessive amount alcohol , opinion investigator . Have history substance dependence ( within 12 month screen ) abuse ( within six month screen ) define DSMIVTR ( exception nicotine caffeine ) . Positive result drug screen exclusionary unless patient valid prescription medication ( i.e. , benzodiazepine ) . Have unstable depression , opinion investigator . Have experience EPS within 30 day prior Visit 1 . Are currently take clozapine . Are currently take aripiprazole ( enrollment Cohorts 1 2 ) . Have history blood donation excess 500 mL blood within 30 day prior Visit 1 . Have receive treatment investigational drug device within 60 day prior Visit 1 . Have positive test human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) antibody , Hepatitis B surface antigen Hepatitis C antibody . Are employee Omeros , investigator , study staff member , immediate family member .
